Text: Fw Memo to Barrett on Spoliation of EvidenceAND PRIVILEGED ATTORNEY CLIENT COMMUNICATION AND ATTORNEY WORK PRODUCT Richard and Andy Here are some points put together by my associate The research is by no means exhaustivePlease call me when youve had a chance to review Thanks Barrett Original Message From Mark A Giugliano ibbsBrunscom To Barrett H Reasoner ibbsBrunscom Sent Wed May Subject Memo to Barrett on Spoliation of Evidence Attached is the memo Call me at home if you need any more assistance with this tonight Memo to Barrett on Spoliation of EvidencevWPD

RE meeting with expertsset for the th Ill prepare an agenda Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday June AM To ibbsBrunscom Subject Re meeting with experts Has this been set Who is coming What is the agenda Barrett H Reasoner To Sanders Richard ibbs cc Brunscom Subject meeting with experts PM What looks better for you June or
July Cc July th date work for the meeting with the one expert who cant come on June th Prof McAfee
